title: What Was The Biggest Gaming News Story of 2021? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.17.21
description:
Blessing and Janet close out the year with one last KFGD of 2021. Let's talk about the biggest news of the year, Tencent acquiring Back 4 Blood's dev, NFT things, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Biggest news of 2021
00:23:30 - Housekeeping
This is our last week of regular content for the year before we go on break!
The Blessing Show will be the last piece of Kinda Funny Games content of the year and that goes up on Monday the 20th.
We’ll be back on January 3rd.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, & Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now
The Roper Report  -
00:24:20 - Tencent Acquires Back 4 Blood Developer Turtle Rock Studios - Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:31:50 - STALKER 2 developer cancels NFT plans after blowback - Owen S Good @ Polygon
00:44:10 - Ad
00:48:30 - A new Ghostbusters game is ‘definitely happening’, Ernie Hudson says - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:51:27 - GTA Online's New Update Confirms Which Original GTA 5 Ending Is Canon - Jared Moore @ IGN
00:58:19 - Out today
01:00:00 - Squad Up: Katie G
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
SEE YOU NEXT YEAR!
